message_1: Find the smallest positive integer $x$ such that $3^x \equiv 101 \mod 173$.
message_2:
To find the smallest positive integer $x$ such that $3^x \equiv 101 \mod 173$, we can use the discrete logarithm. We will try to find the smallest $x$ for which the equation holds true.

We can start by calculating the powers of $3$ modulo $173$:

$3^1 \equiv 3 \mod 173$

$3^2 \equiv 9 \mod 173$

$3^3 \equiv 27 \mod 173$

$3^4 \equiv 81 \mod 173$

$3^5 \equiv 243 \equiv 70 \mod 173$

$3^6 \equiv 210 \equiv 37 \mod 173$

$3^7 \equiv 111 \mod 173$

$3^8 \equiv 333 \equiv 160 \mod 173$

$3^9 \equiv 480 \equiv 134 \mod 173$

$3^{10} \equiv 402 \equiv 46 \mod 173$

$3^{11} \equiv 138 \mod 173$

$3^{12} \equiv 414 \equiv 68 \mod 173$

$3^{13} \equiv 204 \equiv 31 \mod 173$

$3^{14} \equiv 93 \mod 173$

$3^{15} \equiv 279 \equiv 106 \mod 173$

$3^{16} \equiv 318 \equiv 145 \mod 173$

$3^{17} \equiv 435 \equiv 89 \mod 173$

$3^{18} \equiv 267 \equiv 94 \mod 173$

$3^{19} \equiv 282 \equiv 109 \mod 173$

$3^{20} \equiv 327 \equiv 154 \mod 173$

$3^{21} \equiv 462 \equiv 116 \mod 173$

$3^{22} \equiv 348 \equiv 175 \equiv 2 \mod 173$

$3^{23} \equiv 6 \mod 173$

$3^{24} \equiv 18 \mod 173$

$3^{25} \equiv 54 \mod 173$

$3^{26} \equiv 162 \mod 173$

$3^{27} \equiv 486 \equiv 140 \mod 173$

$3^{28} \equiv 420 \equiv 74 \mod 173$

$3^{29} \equiv 222 \equiv 49 \mod 173$

$3^{30} \equiv 147 \mod 173$

$3^{31} \equiv 441 \equiv 95 \mod 173$

$3^{32} \equiv 285 \equiv 112 \mod 173$

$3^{33} \equiv 336 \equiv 163 \mod 173$

$3^{34} \equiv 489 \equiv 143 \mod 173$

$3^{35} \equiv 429 \equiv 83 \mod 173$

$3^{36} \equiv 249 \equiv 76 \mod 173$

$3^{37} \equiv 228 \equiv 55 \mod 173$

$3^{38} \equiv 165 \mod 173$

$3^{39} \equiv 495 \equiv 149 \mod 173$

$3^{40} \equiv 447 \equiv 101 \mod 173$

We found that $3^{40} \equiv 101 \mod 173$. Therefore, the smallest positive integer $x$ such that $3^x \equiv 101 \mod 173$ is $x = 40$.
